column4: I also have the AMD k8 64 bit cpu. Having trouble installing...
do you have the dual-core sys?? I have been running Ubuntu since 2008 (8.10???) with no problems-what R U trying to install???
no I don't have a dual-core sys. Give me a min and I'll tell you what I have.
I'm running a AMD Athlon 64 FX 2.2GHz processor if I remember correctly.
